p: In a 50 ml Schlenk equipped with a magnetic stirrer, the epoxy, TBAI and Znl2 are introduced in the given quantities. The two salts are non-soluble in the epoxy and thus remain in suspension. The reactor is hermetically closed and the operation is performed using a number of vacuum and CO 2 cycles. The reactor is then connected to the CO2 line, while keeping it agitated at the given pressure and ambient temperature for the time needed.
